body.p: The affiant T. B. Pool states that he is a practiceing physician & that he is a citizen of Caldwell County Ky. & has been for some years & that he is well acquainted with Chas, Hooper who is the accused in the Indictments now pending in the Caldwell Circuit Court & this affiant has no hesitation in saying that said Chas Hoo^p^per is an honest, sober industrious young man, & his parents are highly esteemed by their neighbors. & no man is considered a better & more lawabiding man than the father of Chas Hooper the accused in the above mentioned Indictment
Subscribed & sworne to before me by T. B Pool This 6" the 6" May 1865

p.hi: J. N. Turner P J C C
